Subject: Prototype Playtest: Quatern and Exquisite Corpse Machine 3
Description: Enjoyable diversions or torture devices? You decide! Heres your chance to playtest two prototype motorized wooden board games. In 'Quatern' up to four players compete simultaneously to place a row of four consecutive beads on a constantly rotating board. 'Exquisite Corpse Machine 3' is an open-ended game designed to facilitate collaborative art work (and encourage quick creative decisions.) The rules take a few seconds to learn and game play lasts about 5 minutes.   Speakers include:Andy Malone - Track: Gaming  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes
